newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico April maquiladora output up 11.5 pct.
newsitem.headline: Mexico April maquiladora output up 11.5 pct.

text.p: Output in Mexico's maquiladora industry rose by 11.5 percent in April compared to the same month last year, the National Statistics Institute (INEGI) said on Wednesday.
The maquiladora, or in-bond, industry is comprised of assembly plants mostly along the U.S. border.
Employment in the industry rose 20.7 percent in April to 873,748 persons versus April 1996. Hours worked rose 18.4 percent.
For the first four months of the year, output rose 13.2 percent compared to the same period of last year.
